title: Reconnect on a new Panel should stay in the new panel and not go to the default panel
author: kaplandani
body_snippet:
<!--
Only file GitHub issues for bugs and feature requests.  All other topics will be closed.

Before opening an issue, please search for a duplicate or closed issue.
Please provide as much detail as possible for us to fix your issue.
-->

<!-- Feature Request -->
<!-- If you file a feature request, please delete the bug section -->
When I use a new panel and the session dies - when doing RECONNECT- the new session is going back to the main screen. 
It should stay on the panel it is cu...

comments.snippet: It is a good feature too have...
comments.author: Git2Swarm

comments.snippet:
Use below option as a workaround: 
![image](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/7956309/26017935/b6c4d210-3731-11e7-888c-99166a43db25.png)

When you reconnect, it still remembers your panel name and you have to pick the panel you prefer.
comments.author: kuroburki

comments.snippet: @kuroburki the work around increases the number of clicks and hence not a good idea from usability perspective
comments.author: sjeeva
